thread.title: Cartel Market Specials: Week of February 20, 2017
thread.title_full: Cartel Market Specials: Week of February 20, 2017

author: NickAvola
title: Cartel Market Specials: Week of February 20, 2017
text:
Cartel Market Specials: Week of February 20, 2017 Get your hands on some Cartel Coins! 
Personalize your galactic adventures with the ultimate Sith battle robes, a grand shipment of rare black and white armor dyes, and a fan-favorite Rest-and-Recharge tool! Get yours on the Cartel Market, this week only: 1 WEEK ONLY: Tuesday, February 21 – Tuesday, February 28 DIRECT SALE ITEM: Xoxaan’s Armor Set – 2,600 Cartel Coins Strike fear into the heart of your enemy as you enter battle wearing these iconic robes. Channel the power of one of the first – and most influential – dark Lords of the Sith. WEEKDAYS ONLY: Tuesday, February 21 – Friday, February 24 RETURNING PACK: Grand Nightlife Pack – 1000 Cartel Coins NOW 750 CARTEL COINS! Due to popular demand, the Grand Nightlife Pack will stay on the Cartel Market for THREE MORE DAYS! From the Recon Walker mount to the Ceremonial Mystic armor to the Dathomir Rancor, this pack is truly for the galaxy’s elite. THIS WEEKEND ONLY: Friday, February 24 – Tuesday, February 28 DIRECT SALE ITEM: Black/Black, White/White, Black/White, White/Black Dye Whether you’re the pride of the Jedi Council or the envy of the Dark Council, one thing is for certain: everybody wants more Black and White dyes. Customize your battle armor with this bold, striking color pattern – before it’s too late! Black/Black Dye 2,000 Cartel Coins Now 1,600 Cartel Coins White/White Dye 1,000 Cartel Coins Now 800 Cartel Coins Black/White, White/Black Dyes 1,000 Cartel Coins Now 800 Cartel Coins DIRECT SALE ITEM: Music Therapy Probe Rest and Recharge – 2,400 Cartel Coins No matter where your galactic travels take you, you’ll never be far from the party with this innovative Rest and Recharge device. Regain your stamina FAST through the power of music – perfect for that special Smuggler or Bounty Hunter in your life. Xoxaan’s Armor Set Black/Black, White/White Dyes Music Therapy Probe Rest and Recharge Terms Archive | NEW! Privacy & Cookie Policy | NEW!
